item.title: Rob add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "So long, and thanks for all the fish." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Rob add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "When the last living thing Has died on account of us, How poetical it would be If Earth could say, In a voice floating up Perhaps From the floor Of the Grand Canyon, "It is done." People did not like it here." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Rob add a quote by Esme Raji Codell
item.description: "It's not our job to be liked(teachers)", I reminded her. "Its our job to help them be smart(students)". Secretly, I thought, who gives a rat's ass if they like us? Sometimes I can hardly stand them!" -- Esme Raji Codell

item.title: Rob add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Once more unto the breach, dear friends, once more; Or close the wall up with our English dead! In peace there's nothing so becomes a man As modest stillness and humility: But when the blast of war blows in our ears, Then imitate the action of the tiger." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Rob add a quote by Walt Whitman
